"widgetTree":[{"$widgetId":"2.EmissionCalculatorModule.Carrier_Type_Information.layoutGrid1","widget":"Div","props":{"class":"mx-name-layoutGrid1 mx-layoutgrid mx-layoutgrid-fluid container-fluid","content":[{"$widgetId":"2.EmissionCalculatorModule.Carrier_Type_Information.layoutGrid1$row0","widget":"Div","props":{"class":"row","content":[{"$widgetId":"2.EmissionCalculatorModule.Carrier_Type_Information.layoutGrid1$row0$column0","widget":"Div","props":{"class":"col-lg-12 col-md-12 col-12","content":[{"$widgetId":"2.EmissionCalculatorModule.Carrier_Type_Information.text1","widget":"Text","props":{"class":"mx-name-text1","caption":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":"Carrier Types"},"args":{}}},"renderMode":"h1"}},{"$widgetId":"2.EmissionCalculatorModule.Carrier_Type_Information.text6","widget":"Text","props":{"class":"mx-name-text6 spacing-outer-bottom-large","caption":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":"At Flexport we offer two types of transport. Truck transport is one of the most commonly used type of carrier. This is because a lot of customers are familiar with this type of carrier and it works properly. However, an interesting switch from traditional truck transport to intermodal transport can be made. This switch can save you money and makes your company more environmentally friendly!"},"args":{}}},"renderMode":"span"}}]}}]}},{"$widgetId":"2.EmissionCalculatorModule.Carrier_Type_Information.layoutGrid1$row1","widget":"Div","props":{"class":"row","content":[{"$widgetId":"2.EmissionCalculatorModule.Carrier_Type_Information.layoutGrid1$row1$column0","widget":"Div","props":{"class":"col-lg col-md-auto col-auto","content":[{"$widgetId":"2.EmissionCalculatorModule.Carrier_Type_Information.image1","widget":"Image","props":{"class":"mx-name-image1 spacing-outer-top-medium","alternativeText":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":""},"args":{}}},"responsive":true,"source":{"$type":"StaticImageProperty","image":{"uri":"img/Atlas_UI_Resources$Layout$trucks_3_deze_gebruiken.png?637529064162397581"}},"onClick":null}}]}},{"$widgetId":"2.EmissionCalculatorModule.Carrier_Type_Information.layoutGrid1$row1$column1","widget":"Div","props":{"class":"col-lg col-md col","content":[{"$widgetId":"2.EmissionCalculatorModule.Carrier_Type_Information.text2","widget":"Text","props":{"class":"mx-name-text2 spacing-outer-bottom-none","caption":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":"Truck"},"args":{}}},"renderMode":"h2"}},{"$widgetId":"2.EmissionCalculatorModule.Carrier_Type_Information.text4","widget":"Text","props":{"class":"mx-name-text4","caption":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":"The traditional and most used type of transport is transport by truck.
